text: Not sure if any other developers here have tried this out but thought I would ask: I have an agency account and a personal developer sandbox account. If I transfer my certifications to another email via the HubSpot academy will it remove my certifications from my agency email account or will it just duplicate to my developer email?
I thin kit physical moves themâ€¦ hence transfer.

yeah - I assumed that also but I thought I would ask in case someone had a similar situation. It would be nice to be able to share certifications to my other developer account although I don't really see a scenario that would need it to share other than my own :stuck_out_tongue: I can always just re-do the tests/practicums, I was just was hoping to save time.
